name: NSPropertyDescription
desc: A description of a property of a Core Data entity.

items.name: var entity: NSEntityDescription
items.desc: The entity description of the receiver.

items.name: var isOptional: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver is optional.

items.name: var isTransient: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver is transient.

items.name: var userInfo: [AnyHashable : Any]?
items.desc: The user info dictionary of the receiver.

items.name: var validationPredicates: [NSPredicate]
items.desc: The validation predicates of the receiver.

items.name: var validationWarnings: [Any]
items.desc: The error strings associated with the receiver’s validation predicates.

items.name: func setValidationPredicates([NSPredicate]?, withValidationWarnings: [String]?)
items.desc: Sets the validation predicates and warnings of the receiver.

items.name: var versionHash: Data
items.desc: The version hash for the receiver.

items.name: var versionHashModifier: String?
items.desc: The version hash modifier for the receiver.

items.name: var renamingIdentifier: String?
items.desc: The renaming identifier for the receiver.

items.name: var isIndexedBySpotlight: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether Core Data adds the property’s value to the Core Spotlight index.
